remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This class is also useful for customizing the serialization of connectors of classes derived from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector>.
